## ChangeDescriptor type

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Multi-dimensional change classification. Uses a discriminated union to enforce that 'modified' actions include both aspect and impact.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ChangeDescriptor = AddedDescriptor | RemovedDescriptor | ModifiedDescriptor | RenamedDescriptor | ReorderedDescriptor;
```
**References:** [AddedDescriptor](./change-detector-core.addeddescriptor.md)<!-- -->, [RemovedDescriptor](./change-detector-core.removeddescriptor.md)<!-- -->, [ModifiedDescriptor](./change-detector-core.modifieddescriptor.md)<!-- -->, [RenamedDescriptor](./change-detector-core.renameddescriptor.md)<!-- -->, [ReorderedDescriptor](./change-detector-core.reordereddescriptor.md)
